projects.title: GPU-Accelerated Lens Simulator
projects.blurb: GPU-accelerated diffraction modeling with a Streamlit UI.
bullets: ~10x speedup (vs CPU) via GPU acceleration with PyTorch.
Can accommodate arbitrary number of lens elements in the optical path.
Simulation metrics include PSF, MTF, effective and back focal lengths.
Visualization of 2D intensity field with optional dark mode.
Custom Streamlit UI for fast, responsive parameter tweaking.
Plans to add many more features, including different optical components and metrics.

projects.title: Knife Vise
projects.blurb: 3-axis benchtop vise for securely holding knives during hand sanding.
bullets: 3-axis design allows for precise positioning and stability.
Features adjustable clamps to securely hold various knife shapes.
Compact design fits on most workbenches without sacrificing space.
Spring loaded jaws for quick and easy release of the knife.
